attributes.action: Confer a knighthood upon Stephen Hawking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stephen Hawking is probably the greatest scientist this country has produced since Newton.  He fully deserves to be elevated to the same status as his illustrious predecessor.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
